turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.How can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first pizza, I would just like cheese. For the second pizza, I would like it to have pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the third pizza, could I have black olives and green peppers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: those sound delicious. What kind of crust did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like thick crust on them, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i write that down correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! and did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the total for the order is $35.39. Should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. I've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. Enjoy those pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
